name: IBM SDK Java Technology信息泄露漏洞
product: ["IBM SDK Java Technology  6R1（<SR8-FP3）", "IBM SDK Java Technology  7（<SR8-FP10）", "IBM SDK Java Technology 7R1（<SR2-FP10）", "IBM SDK Java Technology 5.0（<SR16-FP9）", "IBM SDK Java Technology  6（<SR16-FP3）"]
description: IBM SDK Java Technology是美国IBM公司的一款Java 标准开发工具包（SDK）。IBM SDK, Java Technology Edition 5.0 before SR16-FP9, 6 before SR16-FP3, 6R1 before SR8-FP3, 7 before SR8-FP10,7R1 before SR2-FP10存在信息泄露漏洞，允许远程攻击者通过未明安全管理器通过预期的访问权限、获取敏感信息。
solution:
用户可参考如下厂商提供的安全公告获取补丁以修复该漏洞：
https://www-304.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21695474
patch: IBM SDK Java Technology信息泄露漏洞的补丁
